original_title: 新のぞき屋　援助交際（エンコー）のぞきます
overview: Based on the popular comic series by Hideo Yamamoto serialized in Weekly Young Sunday. Stars Asumi Miwa (Love & Pop). The film depicts a "peeping tom" who uncovers people's darker sides by following them and eavesdropping on their conversations.
title: Voyeurs, Inc. - Enjo Kosai
